Text: Thank you please keep the kinect games coming its unbelievable!
Can someone upload Rainbow Six 3? If someone do, I promise that I will seed till the day I die!

Thanks for the up but seriously what is up with Kinect releases?  This games were released 6 days ago but still no one has bothered to up Kinect Sports which actually got decent reviews while this lump of shit has been up for days.

can you tell me how to make this game work on my xbox 360 kinekt I did burn the dvd and is not working
Please help :):)

korichkov: 

1. your xbox 360 needs to be modded to play burned/back up games.

2. if it is modded (depends which method) try using a wave 4 activation disc (for flashed xboxs) my xbox360 has a flashed samsung drive, i use a wave 4 activate disc to play my backed up kinect games (and all my other back up games)

3. if you dont know what an activation disc is you seriously need help...
Sorry i didnt read the info!!
